body:
Since few days my mainnet node is crashing when sending a transaction(s).

**Expected behavior**

No crash

**Actual behavior**
when calling sendmany via JSON RPC
with params: `["", {(redacted): (redacted)}, null, null, null, true]`

```
Oct 25 10:48:16 myhost.local bitcoind[11906]: bitcoind: wallet/spend.cpp:783: bool CWallet::CreateTransactionInternal(const std::vector<CRecipient>&, CTransactionRef&, CAmount&, int&, bilingual_str&, const CCoinControl&, 
FeeCalculation&, bool): Assertion `coin_selection_params.m_subtract_fee_outputs || fee_needed <= change_and_fee - change_amount' failed.
Oct 25 10:48:16 myhost.local systemd[1]: bitcoind.service: main process exited, code=killed, status=6/ABRT
Oct 25 10:48:16 myhost.local.local systemd[1]: Unit bitcoind.service entered failed state.
Oct 25 10:48:16 myhost.local.local systemd[1]: bitcoind.service failed.
```

**To reproduce**

Not sure

**System information**

<!-- What version of Bitcoin Core are you using, where did you get it (website, self-compiled, etc)? -->
22.0 official build (https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-22.0/bitcoin-22.0-x86_64-linux-gnu.tar.gz)
<!-- What type of machine are you observing the error on (OS/CPU and disk type)? -->
Linux centos 7, x64, AWS EBS

<!-- Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process. -->
debug.log just before the crash
```

432091txo)

433916txo)
2021-10-25T10:46:18Z UpdateTip: new best=00000000000000000001c9f7f7a1f1862d78ed6a25686c7c06fcd3d322fac84c height=706609 version=0x20c00004 log2_work=93.137468 tx=681107058 date='2021-10-25T10:45:54Z' progress=1.000000 cache=56.7MiB(

2021-10-25T10:48:15Z [default wallet] keypool reserve 51379
```

in other cases there was no line with `AddToWallet(TX redacted)  update`
